descriptions.title: Challenge
descriptions.text: Create a digital experience that surprises and engages the user with a highly emotional Audi milestone product while building up the foundations of the brand’s future marketing ecosystem and its global cross-agency collaboration model.

descriptions.title: Outcomes
descriptions.text: We built a flawless, next level premium User Journey with a distinctive e-commerce focus, set up a high-performance software delivery pipeline for faster and scalable ways of collaboration and brought in a company-wide software architecture approach with Micro Frontend Technology, enabling developers to work at pace.

slider.title: Start with trust
slider.text: To deliver in time, we built on the trust we gained in 5 years of teamwork. Together with Audi, we then trained new ways of collaboration to increase pace and proof Vorsprung. We created a dedicated Agile Release Train consisting of five agile, cross-functional teams, delivering digital premium to Audi’s 19 key markets.

slides.altText: Person sitting at a desk in an office, a bonsai tree is seen in the foreground

info.title: International
info.text: We united talents from BER, HAM, FRA, Canada & USA

slides.altText: Person sitting at a desk in an office, a bonsai tree is seen in the foreground

info.title: Remote first
info.text: Most of the team has never met in person

info.title: Agile
info.text: Integrated software development processes dramatically increased productivity

info.title: Autonomous
info.text: Responsibility and true product responsibility led to on-time delivery
